Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Oh, Link! What brings you here? I thought
you'd be having dinner right about now.
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Oh, Link! What brings you to a place
like this?
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm standing guard<sp:5:0:0> to keep any thieves
from stealing the valuable <clr:0000>treasure<clr:ffff> and
<clr:0000>weapons<clr:ffff> inside the castle.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Trust me, I've got this handled. <sp:5:0:0>You don't
need to worry about a thing!

Oh, but since you're from the castle,<sp:5:0:0>
you're more than welcome to go inside.

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>Just be careful. <sp:5:0:0>I've heard that there are
monsters running around in there...
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease>I got all turned around again... This place
is a maze...<sp:5:1:0> Hm?
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Oh, Link,<sp:5:0:0> right? <sp:5:1:0>Sorry about that, I didn't
see you there.

I'm Nobiro.


There's still a bunch of valuable <clr:0000>treasure<clr:ffff>
and <clr:0000>weapons<clr:ffff> inside the castle, so they
asked me to guard the place from thieves.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>But I'm a little lost...<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh, but don't you worry about me! Go
right ahead.<sp:5:1:0> I mean, you are from the
castle after all, so...<sp:5:0:0>yeah!
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Wait, <sp:5:0:0>did you come to keep watch for
thieves trying to steal the <clr:0000>treasure<clr:ffff> from
Hyrule Castle?
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>If that's the case, I've got it handled.<sp:5:0:0>
Don't you worry about a thing!
Talk:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>So this is the inside of Hyrule Castle...
It's practically a maze. <sp:5:1:0>Hm?
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Oh, Link! What brings you here so bright
and early?
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Oh, Link! Fancy seeing you here this time
of day.
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Oh, Link! What brings you here when it's
all dark and scary out?
